biotools.summary: ZINCPharmer is webserver for screening the purchasable subset of the ZINC database (updates occur monthly). ZINCPharmer can import LigandScout and MOE pharmacophore definitions, as well as identify pharmacophore features directly from a molecular structure.

bioschemas.name: ZINCPharmer
bioschemas.summary: ZINCPharmer is webserver for screening the purchasable subset of the ZINC database (updates occur monthly). ZINCPharmer can import LigandScout and MOE pharmacophore definitions, as well as identify pharmacophore features directly from a molecular structure.
